name: @astrojs/react
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方React集成，用于在Astro项目中使用React组件。
descriptionEn: Astro's official React integration for using React components in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/vue
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Vue集成，用于在Astro项目中使用Vue组件。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Vue integration for using Vue components in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/svelte
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Svelte集成，用于在Astro项目中使用Svelte组件。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Svelte integration for using Svelte components in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/solid-js
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Solid.js集成，用于在Astro项目中使用Solid.js组件。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Solid.js integration for using Solid.js components in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/preact
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Preact集成，用于在Astro项目中使用Preact组件。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Preact integration for using Preact components in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/alpinejs
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Alpine.js集成，用于在Astro项目中使用Alpine.js。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Alpine.js integration for using Alpine.js in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/netlify
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Netlify适配器，用于在Netlify上部署Astro项目。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Netlify adapter for deploying Astro projects on Netlify.

name: @astrojs/vercel
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Vercel适配器，用于在Vercel上部署Astro项目。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Vercel adapter for deploying Astro projects on Vercel.

name: @astrojs/cloudflare
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Cloudflare适配器，用于在Cloudflare上部署Astro项目。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Cloudflare adapter for deploying Astro projects on Cloudflare.

name: @astrojs/node
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Node.js适配器，用于在Node.js环境中部署Astro项目。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Node.js adapter for deploying Astro projects in Node.js environments.

name: @astrojs/mdx
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方MDX集成，用于在Astro项目中使用MDX格式。
descriptionEn: Astro's official MDX integration for using MDX format in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/sitemap
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方站点地图插件，用于生成网站的XML站点地图。
descriptionEn: Astro's official sitemap plugin for generating XML sitemaps for websites.

name: @astrojs/partytown
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Partytown集成，用于在Web Worker中运行第三方脚本。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Partytown integration for running third-party scripts in Web Workers.

name: @astrojs/markdoc
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Markdoc集成，用于在Astro项目中使用Markdoc格式。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Markdoc integration for using Markdoc format in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/db
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方数据库集成，用于在Astro项目中使用数据库。
descriptionEn: Astro's official database integration for using databases in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/rss
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方RSS插件，用于生成网站的RSS订阅源。
descriptionEn: Astro's official RSS plugin for generating RSS feeds for websites.

name: astro-reading-time
author: Astro Community
description: 计算文章阅读时间的Astro插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for calculating article reading time.

name: astro-expressive-code
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站提供增强的代码块展示功能。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for enhanced code block display.

name: astro-embed
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站嵌入各种媒体内容的插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for embedding various media content.

name: astro-icon
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站添加图标支持的插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for adding icon support to websites.

name: astro-google-analytics
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站添加Google Analytics跟踪。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for adding Google Analytics tracking to websites.

name: astro-og-canvas
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站生成Open Graph图像。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for generating Open Graph images for websites.

name: astro-robots-txt
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站生成robots.txt文件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for generating robots.txt files for websites.
